text: Wang Hui (, born 28 November 1976) is a Chinese former wrestler. He won a bronze medal at the 1998 Asian Games, competing in Men's Greco-Roman 54 kg. He also competed in the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== * * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of China Category:Wrestlers at the 1998 Asian Games Category:Wrestlers at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Wrestlers at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1998 Asian Games Category:Sportspeople from Anhui Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling
title: Wang Hui (wrestler)
